class.name: org.geneontology.gold.hibernate.model.ClsIntersectionOf
class.comment: A shorthand for stating necessary and sufficient definitions. For any cls, the set of all_intersection_of tuples are collected. This constitutes a conjunctive expression that is equivalent to cls. E.g. [Term] id: blue_car intersection_of: car intersection_of: has_color blue ==> [gold] cls_intersection_of(blue_car,null,car) cls_intersection_of(blue_car,has_color,blue) ==> [owl] EquivalentTo (blue_car IntersectionOf(car SomeValuesFrom(has_color blue))) // Limitation: only a single such equivalence relation is allowed per class // Note that there should never be a cls that only has a single cls_intersection_of. MAPPINGS: OBO: intersection_of OWL: EquivalentTo(cls IntersectionOf( {...} ) -- see obo2owl doc LEAD: term2term[completes=1]
